dcterms:description: The MSP Podcast dataset contains speech spoken by English speakers collected from online audio shows, covering topics such as politics, sports, entertainment, etc. The speech segments in this dataset contain single speaker utterances with duration between 2.75 and 11 seconds.
dcterms:title: MSP Podcast dataset

dcterms:description: An internal dataset containing 120 hours of speech material spoken in US English, with perceptually assigned valence, arousal, and dominance scores.
dcterms:title: Internal dataset
